ITEM 2. PR.summary:
Here are the key facts extracted from PART I - ITEM 2. PR section in bullet points:

• MSFT's corporate headquarters are located in Redmond, Washington.
• The company has approximately 15 million square feet of space used for various purposes in King County, Washington.
• Approximately 12 million square feet of owned space is situated on approximately 530 acres of land at the corporate headquarters.
• The company owns and leases facilities domestically and internationally, including offices, datacenters, and research and development spaces.
• As of June 30, 2024, MSFT's international properties include:
 - Owned properties in China, India, Ireland, and the Netherlands (square footage not specified).
 - Leased properties in Australia, Canada, China, France, Germany, India, Ireland, Israel, Japan, the Netherlands, and the United Kingdom (square footage not specified).

ITEM 9B. OTHER.summary:
Here are the key facts from PART II - ITEM 9B. OTHER section:

• None of MSFT's officers or directors adopted, modified, or terminated a "Rule 10b5-1 trading arrangement" during the three months ended June 30, 2024.
• No non-Rule 10b5-1 trading arrangements were adopted, modified, or terminated by MSFT's officers or directors during the three months ended June 30, 2024.

ITEM 14. PRINCIPAL ACCOU.summary:
Here are the key facts extracted from PART III - ITEM 14. PRINCIPAL ACCOU section in bullet points:

• The principal accountant for MSFT is Deloitte & Touche LLP (PCAOB ID No.: XXXX).
• Fees and services provided by Deloitte & Touche LLP are disclosed under the headings "Fees Billed by Deloitte & Touche" and "Policy on Audit Committee Pre-Approval of Audit and Permissible Non-Audit Services of Independent Auditor" in the Proxy Statement.
 
Note: The PCAOB ID number is not provided as it was not included in the original text.

ITEM 16. FORM.summary:
Here are the key facts extracted from PART IV - ITEM 16. FORM section as bullet points:

• The report was signed on July 30, 2024.
• The signing location is the City of Redmond, State of Washington.
• The report is pursuant to Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.

Note: There are no other key facts provided in this section.
